definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: take or seek refuge (Ar. 9wd-, 9a0d-a take refuge, seek protection, ma9a0dun a refuge);—

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: bring into safety, Pf. 3 mpl. [[הֵעִ֫יזוּ]] Is 10:31, obj. om., and so Imv. mpl. [[הָעִ֫יזוּ]] Je 4:6, [[הָעִ֫זוּ מִקֶּרֶב]] Je 6:1; c. acc., ms. [[הָעֵז]] Ex 9:19.
